lead_paragraph: Juan Pablo Montoya will make his Nascar debut Oct. 28 in a Busch Series race at Memphis Motorsports Park, his team announced yesterday. Montoya will drive the No. 42 Dodge for Chip Ganassi Racing.
snippet: Juan Pablo Montoya will make his Nascar debut Oct. 28 in a Busch Series race at Memphis Motorsports Park, his team announced yesterday. Montoya will drive the No. 42 Dodge for Chip Ganassi Racing.
